These are projects I have built both ind: These are projects I have built both individually and in collaboration with talented teams. Feel free to contact me through any means available on my home page and by email.
Career Canvas is a class-leading writing: Career Canvas is a class-leading writing service providing everyone, from interns to executives, professionally written résumés. I created branding and did all front-end web design.
The user and admin dashboards alike are: The user and admin dashboards alike are designed with crisp typography and easy to understand layout. Experiences for end users should not be an afterthought.
The header is accessible to keyboard and: The header is accessible to keyboard and screen reader users and does not require a manual to understand the site's hierarchy.
Clinician's Brief is the foremost peer r: Clinician's Brief is the foremost peer reviewed journal for veterinarians. I designed and implemented redesigns for the entire site, as well as its sister site, Veterinary Team Brief.
The navigation is designed to be immedia: The navigation is designed to be immediately understood and not distract from the reading or browsing experience of the site. The lower half only appears on article pages to provide sharing and saving features.
The Clinician's Brief site has been sele: The Clinician's Brief site has been selected as a finalist for two Folio: Ozzie design awards. Two articles have been selected as finalists for a Folio: Eddie award.
EVO and Company is a new clothing brand: EVO and Company is a new clothing brand for active people. This project features branding, front-end web design, and development work.
I created a dark mode toggle for users d: I created a dark mode toggle for users desiring a high-contrast experience. It is usable for anyone and adds a much better experience for users with impaired vision.
The project is off to a great start. The: The project is off to a great start. The site is expanding quickly to fit the evolving needs of the company.
